title: Business Analyst
description:
Job Description

As a Business Analyst Trainee, you will work closely with senior business analysts and cross-functional teams to analyze business processes, gather requirements, and assist in the implementation of business solutions. You will be involved in data analysis, process improvement, and problem-solving, contributing to the achievement of business objectives.

Key Responsibilities:


Assist in gathering, documenting, and analyzing business requirements from stakeholders.
Help in the creation of functional specifications and business process documentation.
Support the senior business analysts in analyzing and improving business processes.
Participate in data collection, interpretation, and analysis to identify trends and insights.
Collaborate with technical teams to ensure business requirements are understood and implemented.
Assist in the development and execution of test cases for system implementations or improvements.
Assist in the creation of user manuals and training materials for end users.
Support ongoing project management tasks including project tracking, status updates, and risk management.
Participate in meetings with business stakeholders to understand challenges and opportunities.
Assist in preparing reports and presentations for internal and external stakeholders.


Requirements

Skills and Qualifications:


Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Management, IT, or a related field (Freshers are welcome).
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
Good understanding of business processes and workflow.
Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
Basic knowledge of SQL or other data analysis tools is a plus.
Familiarity with Business Analysis tools (e.g., Microsoft Visio, JIRA, or similar) is a plus.
Strong attention to detail and ability to manage multiple tasks efficiently.


Personal Attributes:


Eagerness to learn and grow within the business analysis field.
Strong initiative and a proactive approach to challenges.
Ability to work well under pressure and meet deadlines.
Strong interpersonal skills and the ability to interact with diverse teams.
A positive attitude and willingness to take on new responsibilities.


Requirements

Requirements: Currently pursuing or recently completed a degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field. Basic knowledge of Python programming and its libraries (e.g., Pandas, Flask, Django, etc.). Familiarity with Git or other version control systems. Strong problem-solving skills and a keen eye for detail. Ability to work independently and collaborate in a remote team environment. Eagerness to learn, take on challenges, and improve coding skills. Good communication skills in English (both written and verbal). Preferred Skills (optional but advantageous): Familiarity with web development frameworks such as Django or Flask. Experience with databases like MySQL, PostgreSQL, or MongoDB. Understanding of REST APIs and web services. Knowledge of front-end technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript) is a plus.
